description: Specify as True to indicate that this submission adds, but doesn't delete or update Transaction Tax ID Exception Rule Lines.

validation.validation: You can't select any regions when you have selected more than one country.
You can't select customer criteria for spend rule dimensions.
You must select a tax ID type override when you select Specific Tax ID Type.
The region you selected isn't available for the country you selected.
You can't select supplier criteria for revenue rule dimensions.
You must make a selection for the logic for the Tax ID Type.
You can't have more than one exception rule with the same exception rule dimensions.
You can't select a tax ID type that is invalid to use for the entity type.
You can't select a company for spend rule dimensions.
You can't select a supplier for revenue rule dimensions.
You can only select a tax ID type override when you select Specific Tax ID Type.
The region you selected isn't available for the country you selected.
Define a unique Line Order for each line in the rule set.
